clear.confirm: Are you sure you want to clear all chat and settings data?
clear.desc: Clear all chat and settings data
clear.title: Clear All Data

reset.confirm: Are you sure you want to reset all settings?
reset.desc: Reset all settings to default values
reset.title: Reset All Settings

compressThreshold.desc: When the uncompressed chat history exceeds this value, it will be compressed
compressThreshold.title: Chat History Compression Threshold

historyCount.desc: Number of history messages to include in each request
historyCount.title: History Message Count

inputTemplate.desc: The latest user message will be filled into this template
inputTemplate.title: User Input Preprocessing

frequencyPenalty.desc: The higher the value, the more likely it is to reduce repeated words
frequencyPenalty.title: Frequency Penalty

maxTokens.desc: Maximum number of tokens used in a single interaction
maxTokens.title: Single Reply Limit

presencePenalty.desc: The higher the value, the more likely it is to expand to new topics
presencePenalty.title: Topic Freshness

temperature.desc: The higher the value, the more random the reply
temperature.title: Randomness

topP.desc: Similar to randomness, but do not change together with randomness
topP.title: Top-p Sampling

endpoint.desc: Must include http(s)://, in addition to the default address
endpoint.title: API Proxy Endpoint

accessCode.desc: Encryption access is enabled by the administrator
accessCode.title: Access Password

neutralColor.desc: Custom grayscale for different color biases
neutralColor.title: Neutral Color
